company.title: Voilà Vélo Fruité
company.subtitle: We create innovative and sustainable events
company.description1: Voilà Vélo Fruité is a pop-up events company that promotes cycling, sustainability, health, and happiness using our Quebec-made blender bikes.
company.description2: We are a team of passionate event organizers who believe in ethical and sustainable practices to create a happier and healthier world — one smoothie event at a time! We use washable or biodegradable cups, offset our carbon, compost or recycle all waste produced, and donate to UNICEF.
company.description3: Voilà Vélo Fruité is perfect for engaging and inspiring your audience through entertaining catering, brand exposure, or promoting sustainability and health at events.
company.description4: The company was founded by Leen and Micha in 2020 with the help of their dedicated team. They now run events in Montreal, Quebec City, Laval, and Ottawa.

founders.title: Our Founders
founders.subtitle: Leen and Micha
founders.description: We're Leen and Micha — two sisters with a big love for nature, healthy living, and biking. That's how Voilà Vélo Fruité came to life — a joyful concept where people of all ages can hop on a smoothie bike, pedal their hearts out, and create their own delicious drink, powered entirely by their energy! We believe in spreading positivity, promoting wellness, and getting everyone involved — no matter how young or old. Whether it's at a school event, a festival, or a corporate gathering, Voilà Vélo brings fun, flavor, and feel-good vibes to every occasion.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to make healthy living fun, simple, and inspiring. By combining motion, sustainability, and nutrition, we aim to spark awareness while creating happy, tasty memories. We believe that one pedal stroke is all it takes to reconnect with your body, nature, and each other — and Voilà Vélo is here to make that happen.

healthWellness.title: Health & Wellness
healthWellness.description: We believe that nourishing your body should be both delicious and enjoyable.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: We are committed to supporting local producers and practicing eco-friendly methods.

community.title: Community
community.description: We foster connection and joy by bringing people together through our smoothie experiences.

empowerment.title: Empowerment & Inclusion
empowerment.description: We inspire people of all ages and backgrounds to participate, create, and feel energized — because everyone deserves to be part of the fun and positive change.

howWeDo.title: We do this by:
points: Making health and wellness easy and fun for any demographic;

Adopting sustainable and ethical practices by using only washable or biodegradable cups (and taking a stand against the use of straws or lids), composting or recycling almost ALL of our waste including soft plastic, using carbon offsets to neutralize our emissions, and donating to UNICEF and local organizations;
Partnering with companies that share a similar mission.
So supporting us means supporting our wonderful planet.
We also build each blender bike by hand in Quebec.

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.description: Our partners specialize in pedal-powered events using bikes to engage, educate, and entertain children and adults.
